We enjoy doing it and feel like we‚Äôre continuing the fun and festive tradition. However, in recent years, not all of the recipients acknowledge receipt. Representative_Docs: ['HNL Lab Medicine Brings Escape Room Fun to Hospital Education ALLENTOWN, Pa., Nov. 10, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- HNL Lab Medicine is transforming hospital training by turning mandatory education into an adventure.
